response.original_title: Beyond Italy: Louis Fuller and the Seven Doors of Death
response.overview: Legendary producer Terry Levene talks about how he released Lucio Fulci's classic The Beyond under the Americanised guise of The Seven Doors of Death to American cinemas back in the early 1980s. This interview appears on the nationwide DVD and Blu Ray release of The Beyond from Arrow Video in the UK.
response.title: Beyond Italy: Louis Fuller and the Seven Doors of Death
